data.name: AER Memories of Old Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The gods of old are forgotten, lost in the events that shattered the world, leaving only fragments of islands in the sky. This mystic world of endless skies, colorful islands and ancient ruins is in danger of falling into darkness.

The AER soundtrack reflects the visual design and the playstyle of the game perfectly. Deep, relaxing grooves will get you in the right mood for an unforgettable journey through the world of floating islands AER Memories of Old.

Tracklist:

1 In memory of
2 Home
3 Sun and Moon
4 The Vault
5 Refuge
6 Twilight Keeper
7 Onn
8 Mountains
9 Machine
10 Keeper of Dreams
11 Iquili
12 King's Pass
13 Tear
14 Old Friend
15 Roof of the World
16 Memories of Old
17 Watcher of the Veil
18 Karah
19 Beginnings (Bonus track)
20 Dance of the Crab King's Court (Bonus track)
